text: Danish Azad Ansari is an Indian politician. He is a member of the Uttar Pradesh Legislative Council since 2022. He belongs to the Bharatiya Janata Party. He is also the Minister of State for Minority Welfare, Muslim Waqf and Hajj in the Government of Uttar Pradesh. == Early life == Danish Azad Ansari was born on 30 May 1988 in Ballia, Uttar Pradesh, India. == Education == Danish Azad Ansari went to Holy Cross School in Ballia, Uttar Pradesh. He studied at University of Lucknow. == Political career == Danish Azad Ansari was a member of Akhil Bharatiya Vidyarthi Parishad when he was a student. In 2022, Danish Azad Ansari became a minister in the Government of Uttar Pradesh. He is the only Muslim minister in the government. Ansari is a member of the Uttar Pradesh Legislative Council since 2022. == Posts held == # From To Position Comments 01 2022 Now Member, Uttar Pradesh Legislative Council first time == References == Category:Politics of India
title: Danish Azad Ansari
